text:
Hey everyone, I’m looking for help with sending an order confirmation email to customers, which will be populated through my Node.js app. I want to use HubSpot as a middleware to track these emails. I’ve been exploring HubSpot's SMTP and Transactional Email API for this purpose, but it seems like I need to purchase the Transactional Email add-on to use the feature.
Is there any way for developers to test this for free, or are there any alternatives within HubSpot that I can use for tracking emails during the development phase?
No clue what channel this message belongs to..

Hey <@U042D0K7H27>, yes this is definitely possible. You’d want to make a <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/apps/private-apps/overview|private app> if you haven’t already — this gives you an access token you can use to authenticate API calls.

These API calls could be sent from a <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/automation/custom-code-actions|custom coded workflow action> (programmable automation) or some external system, but either way you’d want to send them to the DELETE endpoint for the object that you want to delete. Here’s the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/crm/objects/contacts#delete-%2Fcrm%2Fv3%2Fobjects%2Fcontacts%2F%7Bcontactid%7D|endpoint for contacts>, which you can test on that page using your access token.

From there, you just need the ID of the record you want to delete, and that’s easy to get in a workflow. Hope that helps!
How to send a new value for an html field? My html experiment is not accepted. I can set other fields without a problem.

Hello,
Is there a way to list marketing events via API?
I've looked at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/marketing/marketing-events/v3#basic> but can't seem to find a list function
I don’t think this a good place to get help or answers :disappointed:

Scrolling up,
Lots of post of questions or asking for help with no responses
I was answered before on here
Answer: Same as every other field. Just remember to write all field names in the api call in lower case.

Hello, everyone.
There are contacts which have tickets with are associated with those contacts, and I want to get the ticket's property while retrieving contacts, then can i get the ticket property using only one api?
Are there any expand option while getting association data?
Thanks
